Package com.SuperheroSightings.springbootrestjdbctemplatemaven.controller

Class LocationController

java.lang.Object
com.SuperheroSightings.springbootrestjdbctemplatemaven.controller.LocationController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/locations") public class LocationController extends Object
Controller class for managing CRUD operations related to Locations. This class provides RESTful API endpoints for client applications to perform operations on the Location entity. It supports creating, updating, deleting, and retrieving location records.
Since:
(2023-09-11)
Version:
1.0
Author:
Mercy Aigbe Azeta

  • Method Details

    • getAllLocations

      @GetMapping public List<Location> getAllLocations()
      Retrieves a list of all locations in the system. API Endpoint: GET http://localhost:8080/api/locations
      Returns:
      List of Location objects.

    • getLocationById

      @GetMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Location> getLocationById(@PathVariable int id)
      Retrieves details of a specific location identified by its ID. API Endpoint: GET http://localhost:8080/api/locations/{id}
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the location to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the Location object or an error status.

    • addLocation

      @PostMapping public Location addLocation(@RequestBody Location location)
      Creates a new location record. API Endpoint: POST http://localhost:8080/api/locations Body: JSON representation of the location to create
      Parameters:
      location - Location object containing details of the location to be created.
      Returns:
      Created location with the assigned ID.

    • updateLocation

      @PutMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Void> updateLocation(@PathVariable int id, @RequestBody Location location)
      Updates details of a specific location identified by its ID. API Endpoint: PUT http://localhost:8080/api/locations/{id} Body: JSON representation of the updated location details
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the location to be updated.
      location - Location object containing updated details.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity indicating the update status.

    • deleteLocation

      @DeleteMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Void> deleteLocation(@PathVariable int id)
      Deletes a specific location identified by its ID. API Endpoint: DELETE http://localhost:8080/api/locations/{id}
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the location to be deleted.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity indicating the delete status.
